text.author: Wikinews
text.title: The Onion: An interview with 'America's Finest News Source'
text.summary: In an interview with Wikinews, Editorial Manager Chet Clem and President Sean Mills of the Onion, a satirical news publication, explain how they create issues starting with jocular headlines through adding content and graphics, and tell about their writers' room and the kinds of stories the publish.
